MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG1 postcode area of Dumfries, affecting properties in Georgetown Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.55am. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.12am on Wednesday 23rd December 2020
